title: THIS IS SO ANNOYING Disconnect every 5 seconds
body:
Literally every 5 seconds at the menus, I try to join a lobby and disconnect. I try to do anything Disconnect.

Didn't start happening till the last patch.. its extremely annoying

replies.body:
same here. i get disconnected from the menus constantly. if i'm fortunate enough to make it in a lobby, ill get disconnected in the lobby once or twice. if the countdown makes it to 0 whilst i'm disconnected, ill get booted from the lobby back to the menus.

once the gods allow me into a game though i haven't been disconnected once. after the game is over though the LoL client just auto crashes and closes every time.

this all started happening after the last patch.
Yea I can't join anything because it keeps saying error.
Same here, its horrible. I've gotten a punishment cause of it
